I1.name: Voracity
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Scoring a champion {{tip|takedown}} within 3 seconds of damaging them {{sti|cdr|reduces}} the '''current''' cooldowns of '''Katarina's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] by 15 seconds.

{{sbc|Innate - Sinister Steel:}} Whenever '''Katarina''' retrieves a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}}, she uses it to slash around herself, dealing {{pp|68;72;77;82;89;96;103;112;121;131;142;154;166;180;194;208;224;240|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|55 to 88 for 4|1 to 16}} AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness to enemy {{tip|champions}} hit, as well as {{sti|cdr|reducing}} ''{{ai|Shunpo|Katarina|Shunpo's}}'' '''total''' cooldown by {{pp|key=%|78 to 96 for 4|1 to 16}}.
{{as|Daggers|buzzword}} will disappear after being on the ground for 4 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of their radius.
I1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Scoring a champion takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them reduces the current cooldowns of Katarina's champion ability by 15 seconds.
Innate - Sinister Steel: Whenever Katarina retrieves a Dagger, she uses it to slash around herself, dealing 68;72;77;82;89;96;103;112;121;131;142;154;166;180;194;208;224;240 − undefined (based on level) (+ 75% bonus AD) (+ 1 to 16 ‒ undefined AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness to enemy champions hit, as well as reducing Katarina's Shunpo's total cooldown by 1 to 16 ‒ undefined.
Daggers will disappear after being on the ground for 4 seconds, granting sight of their radius.
I1.notes:
* ''Voracity's'' cooldown reduction will still take effect even after '''Katarina''' dies.
* The {{as|Dagger's|buzzword}} area of effect indicator is displayed even before it lands, although '''Katarina''' may not slash until it has. This can be targeted by {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}.
* {{as|Daggers|buzzword}} will still deal damage but not apply on-hit effects if {{tip|dodged}}. They cannot be {{tip|block|blocked}} nor can they be missed while '''Katarina''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* Single-use on-hit effects, such as {{tip|Spellblade}}, will apply to the closest target to '''Katarina''' when she uses a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}}.

Q.name: Bouncing Blade
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Katarina''' throws a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} at the target enemy that can bounce to up to two additional nearby enemies, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
The {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} then lands onto the ground after 1 second, {{tt|roughly 350 units|slightly random location}} opposite from where it struck the first target.
''The {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} bounces to targets regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them.''
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target enemy that can bounce to up to two additional nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.
The Dagger then lands onto the ground after 1 second, roughly 350 units opposite from where it struck the first target.
The Dagger bounces to targets regardless of having sight of them.

W.name: Preparation
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Katarina''' tosses a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} into the air above her current location and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays until it lands after {{fd|1.25}} seconds, becoming {{tip|ghosted}} for the same duration.
W.descriptionHtml: Active: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air above her current location and gains bonus movement speed that decays until it lands after 1.25 seconds, becoming ghosted for the same duration.

E.name: Shunpo
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Katarina''' {{tip|blinks}} to the target location around the target unit or {{as|Dagger|buzzword}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the nearest enemy in range and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness.
''Upon blinking, '''Katarina''' remains unable to act via a cast time for {{fd|0.15}} seconds.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Katarina blinks to the target location around the target unit or Dagger, dealing magic damage to the nearest enemy in range and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
Shunpo resets Katarina's basic attack timer.
Upon blinking, Katarina remains unable to act via a cast time for 0.15 seconds.
E.notes:
* ''Shunpo'' can be used on any unit except [[structures]] and {{tip|wards}}.
* ''Shunpo'' can be cast on {{as|Daggers|buzzword}} that haven't landed yet.
* If '''Katarina''' ''Shunpo's'' on an ally, any attack command she is given during its cast time will be negated, and every movement command will be delayed by 1 second (starting at the start of the cast time).
* ''Shunpo'' should be an instant ability but it has extra logic to consider which makes it have a short cast time before blinking.
* {{si|Flash}} can be used during cast time but it will not cancel the blink.
* If the target is very close to a wall and '''Katarina''' targets ''Shunpo'' behind the target, she can blink over the wall.
* ''Shunpo''  will still deal damage but not apply on-hit effects if {{tip|dodged}}. It cannot be {{tip|block|blocked}} nor can it be missed while '''Katarina''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* ''Shunpo'' does not require the enemy to be within targeting range to damage them. It only requires them to be within the max range around a unit that ''Shunpo'' allows them to blink to.
{{ct|cast}}

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 50% AD) (+ 25% AP)

R.name: Death Lotus
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Katarina''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds, rapidly throwing a dagger every {{fd|0.166}} seconds to up to 3 of the closest nearby enemy champions, {{tip|sight|revealing}} herself in the process.

Each dagger deals {{as|physical damage}} and {{as|magic damage}}, applies {{tip|on-attack}} and {{tip|on-hit}} (without applying {{stil|life steal}}) effects, and inflicts 40% {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} on the target for 3 seconds.
''An enemy champion within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 500 units is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be {{tip|sight|visible}} to be thrown at.''
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Katarina channels for up to 2.5 seconds, rapidly throwing a dagger every 0.166 seconds to up to 3 of the closest nearby enemy champions, revealing herself in the process.

Each dagger deals physical damage and magic damage, applies on-attack and on-hit (without applying Unknown value: stil / life steal) effects, and inflicts 40% Grievous Wounds on the target for 3 seconds.
An enemy champion within cr 500 units is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be visible to be thrown at.
R.notes:
* An alternate way of writing the formula for the '''bonus AD''' ratio is {{as|16%|attack damage}} {{times}} (1 + {{as|0.8 '''total''' attack speed}}) {{as|'''bonus''' AD}}.
** At level 6, '''Katarina''' has a minimum of {{fd|0.729}} attack speed (bar potential reduction from {{tip|cripple|attack speed slows}}).
*** The minimum physical damage per dagger is {{as|25.33% bonus AD}}.
* In ''addition'' to already revealing herself, '''Katarina''' will {{tip|sight|reveal}} her location (450 radius) for {{fd|4.5}} seconds every time she throws a dagger at an enemy while the enemy team does not otherwise have vision of her.{{bug}}
** Because of this, the vision on '''Katarina's''' location will persist for up-to {{fd|4.5}} seconds after the channel ends.
* ''Death Lotus'' will not end if no enemies remain in range.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block and be consumed by only one dagger.
* Each dagger counts as a separate hit for effects such as {{ri|Conqueror}}, {{ri|Electrocute}}, and {{iis|Eclipse}} {{nie|Ever Rising Moon}}.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Katarina''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|cast=interrupts|move=Disabled in the first and last {{fd|0.25}} seconds of channel, otherwise, interrupts.|attack=Disabled in the first and last {{fd|0.25}} seconds of channel, otherwise, interrupts.|items=interrupts,true,,false,,false,false,false,melee|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,false,false}}
* Trying to cast a disabled active (excluding {{ii|Hextech Rocketbelt}}) will buffer it to cast at the completion of the channel.
